tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SatelliteCommunicationAccessControl (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    role VARCHAR,
    access_level VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE communications (
    communication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    communication_type VARCHAR(20),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);
